TOOLTIPS.GREL_VALUE_HELP: Open value type documentation in separate window
TOOLTIPS.VIEW_MODE_CONFIGURATION: Enable mapping configuration mode. Only configuration data will be visible.
TOOLTIPS.VIEW_MODE_PREVIEW: Enable mapping preview mode. Only data preview will be visible.
TOOLTIPS.VIEW_MODE_BOTH: Enable mapping mixed config and preview mode. Both data preview and configurations will be visible.
TOOLTIPS.DOWNLOAD_SPARQL: Download SPARQL query or results as a file
TOOLTIPS.GENERATE_SPARQL: Generate query in a new tab
TOOLTIPS.UNSAVED_MAPPING_CHANGES: The are unsaved RDF mapping changes in the previous tab. The generated query will be based on the saved mapping.
TOOLTIPS.DOWNLOAD_QUERY_RESULTS_INFO: Download of results is available only for CONSTRUCT queries.

LABELS.GREL_PLACEHOLDER: Use value, row, cell(s), recon, record
LABELS.GREL_HINT: E.g. cells["Website"].value + "/address". Warning: column names are case sensitive.
LABELS.SUBJECT: Subject RDF Value Mapping
LABELS.PREFIX_PLACEHOLDER: Use the current repository prefixes or add new using the Turtle or SPARQL syntax, i.e PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

MESSAGES.CONFIRM_MAPPING_DELETION: Do you want to remove this mapping?
MESSAGES.CONFIRM_MAPPING_WITH_CHILDREN_DELETION: This mapping has children. If you delete it, all its children will be removed. Do you want to remove this mapping?
MESSAGES.DISCARD_CHANGES: Changes you made will not be saved.
MESSAGES.CONFIRM_NEW_MAPPING: All mappings will be lost. Do you want to proceed?
MESSAGES.EDIT_SAVED_TRIPLE_REF: Changing the type of this cell will delete all children
MESSAGES.CONFIRM_MAPPING_UPLOAD: All mappings will be overwritten. Do you want to proceed?
MESSAGES.INCOMPLETE_MAPPING_ERROR: The operation is not allowed. You have an incomplete mapping.
MESSAGES.AUTOCOMPLETE_OFF_WARNING: Autocomplete is OFF. Please, enable Autocomplete for this repository in GraphDB

ERROR.COLON_NOT_ALLOWED: * Colon is not allowed in prefix
ERROR.NO_ACTIVE_EDITOR_TAB: There is no active tab in the editor at the moment.
ERROR.EDITOR_CONFIG_LOADING_FAILED: Failed to load the editor configuration model.
ERROR.NO_PROJECT_IDENTIFIER: There is no project identifier. Try to refresh the project.

WARNING.UNAVAILABLE_YASGUI_INSTANCE:
There is an issue with the dataset columns functionality.
The behavior will be unstable.
WARNING.DOWNLOAD_RESULT_AVAILABILITY: Download of the results is available only for CONSTRUCT queries.
